contracts.title: Execute Case Variations Consolidation
contracts.description: Execute 12 case variation merges (zero risk). Examples: focusforge → FocusForge, streamertools → Streamertools, tbowtactics → TBOWTactics. Use tools/execute_case_variations_consolidation.py or repo_safe_merge.py.

contracts.title: Trading Repos Consolidation (4 → 1)
contracts.description: Merge trading repos into trading-leads-bot (Repo #17). Source repos: trade-analyzer (#4), UltimateOptionsTradingRobot (#5), TheTradingRobotPlug (#38). Reduction: 3 repos.

contracts.title: Content/Blog Systems Consolidation (69.4x ROI)
contracts.description: Merge content (#41) and FreeWork (#71) into Auto_Blogger (Repo #61). High-value consolidation opportunity with 69.4x ROI. Reduction: 2 repos.

contracts.title: Mermaid Renderer Enhancements (Optional)
contracts.description: Optional improvements to Mermaid renderer: add retry logic for API calls, improve error messages, add logging for debugging. Current status: Production ready, enhancements optional.

notes: Case Variations is lowest risk and ready to execute immediately
Trading Repos and Content/Blog Systems are high-value opportunities
Mermaid renderer enhancements are optional (already production ready)
